duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide strategic recommendations to the COO, CEO, the board of Directors, and other members of our management team to enhance the financial performance of the company.
Collaborate closely with departmental leads including inventory planning, sales, customer experience, supply chain, product development, and marketing.
Develop and enhance strategic alliances that will aid in the transformation to a consumer products company embodied with a tech platform that heightens reach of products to a global audience.
Manage the company's online presence, optimizing the website and social media channels for maximum engagement and conversions.
Lead monthly meetings with the Chief Revenue Officer to develop and enhance strategic alliances.
Expansion and continued relationship building with bankers, insurance broker, equity sponsor, external auditors, vendors, and business partners.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, Business, or a related field (MBA preferred)
